biotools.summary: The Human Gene Coexpression Analysis tool (HGCA) is based on the coexpression analysis of 55431 Human genes from gene pair correlation data of 3500 RNASeq samples from the GTEx Project

bioschemas.name: Human Gene Correlation Analysis (HGCA)
